lines.text: Ah! Such a figure! - ah! - divine - ravishing! - aaah!
What beautiful eyes you have! And you have suffered, too!
How much do you want to borrow, Schaunard?
Borrow is a vulgar word. I offer you the honor to render temporary pecuniary assistance to genius.
I beg Mademoiselle to forgive my horses - they are only beasts - they do not appreciate exquisite beauty...
To the landlord - may his wife have thirteen children - and not one of them French!
Wine, Randolphe - wine for the little one - that will warm her!
To Mimi we give our friendship - our love - a share in everything we have!
I am a most generous patron - but - er - I request - er - a little particular attention...
You worked all night again! Your face is so thin - look what you are doing to yourself! You will lose your looks... and then he will not care for you any more!
You wanted to be alone with that fop!
